task.title: Add Corresponding Fields with the Expression Evaluator
task.shortdesc: Use an Expression Editor to add the credit card type fields to the non-credit card stream so all records have the same format when written to the destination.

context.p: To do this, let's use data preview to verify how we added the credit card type to the records..

step.cmd: In the pipeline, click the Jython Evaluator to view the output of that processor.
Expand the first output record, scroll down, and expand index 21. Note the header and value information, and then click Close Preview.

info.p: From this, we can see that we need to add a map with an index of 21, as well as the header and value fields.

step.cmd: In the stage library, select the Expression Evaluator processor and connect it to default output of the Stream Selector. Or from the Pipeline Creation Help Bar, click Select Processor to Connect Expression Evaluator .
Click the Add icon twice and configure the properties as follows:
step.info: These fields creates a map for index 21, and then creates a header field with the name credit_card_type. The third expression creates the value field and defines it as NA, for "not applicable."check with Adam/Natty about why it was \N. Retake screenshot if necessary.

step.cmd: To write the data from this branch to the destination and merge the non-credit card data with the credit card data, link the Expression Evaluator to the Hadoop FS destination.
